newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia bank association, Ingosstrakh sign contract.
newsitem.headline: Russia bank association, Ingosstrakh sign contract.

text.p: The Association of Russian Banks and Russia's second biggest insurer SAO Ingosstrakh signed on Friday a cooperation agreement to promote Ingosstrakh services among Russian banks.
"We are to inform banks about the advantages of being insured by Ingosstrakh," Association president Sergei Yegorov told a news conference. "We are to look for ways to support banks' stability."

The agreement provides for a series of services Ingosstrakh will provide banks, including insureance of real estate, cash, treasury transportation, and automatic teller machines, Ingosstrakh said in a statment.
However, banks are free to choose any insurance company, it said.
On Friday Ingosstrakh also insured Tokobank's Moscow real estate.
Ingosstrakh already has insurance contracts with 12 Russian banks, over 20 foreign banks' offices in Russia and Russian banks' offices abroad.
